example.name: conative
example.text: Something flailed at the side of Nick's head as they rolled around and around.
example.arg: at the side of Nick's head

example.name: with instrument, oddly
example.text: Curt managed to duck beneath the man's flailing fist, and drove home a solid left to Jess's mid-section.
